newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Two die in jailbreak in Brazil.
newsitem.headline: Two die in jailbreak in Brazil.

text.p: Two prison officials died in a jailbreak on Thursday at a prison in the southern Brazilian state of Santa Catarina, a prison spokesman said.
A prison lawyer was shot to death by two inmates who escaped in his car, taking three prison officials with them as hostages, he said.
One of the hostages died when the car overturned during the escape and the other two were injured, he added.
Another five prisoners escaped on foot from the jail in the town of Sao Cristovao, the spokesman said.
The seven fugitives remained at large on Thursday night.
Another five hostages were taken by the other rebellious inmates of the prison who demanded better medical treatment and a review of their sentences, the spokesman said.
